name: Daisy Hardcastle  100% cotton. Daisy Ella Candy Stripe
description:
Daisy
Big and confident, this Daisy design, with its large floral image will make a great impact to any room! 100% cotton.

If not in stock, please allow 28 days for delivery.
Ella
A ditzy, cheerful design. This busy print instantly adds life to a scheme and with the red tone it will bring warmth to the room.A fun option for curtains, blinds and cushions. 100% cotton.Candy Stripe
Fun, bold and brilliant. Reminiscent of a circus style print, often seen in the ‘Big Top’ tent, this red stripe design is certain to make a statement in the home. This design looks fabulous covering chairs and sofas or dressing a window for a more theatrical look. 100% cotton

name: Daisy Hardcastle Roman Blind please email for Quote
description:
Roman Blinds
A traditional folding blind. When it is pulled up the folds of fabric are still visible. The blind will be supplied on a simple wooden baton, covered in same fabric as blind, with a cord and screw in eyes, plus a cleat hook  In chrome or brass.

name: Daisy Hardcastle vintage 50s ‘Perpetua’
description:
This is a bold and iconic collection of prints and weaves that celebrate a decade of design which transformed the boundaries of interior decoration. The  50’s collection combines original 1950’s designs from the Sanderson archive with designs from contemporary artists who have taken great inspiration from this era.Perpetua
‘Perpetua’ i. This is one of a collection of four modernist designs printed on rayon n in 1953. The simple, stylised shapes represent flower heads and stems. It has been recreated as closely as possible to the original design and is rotary printed in four colourways on 100% cotton. 93% Cotton, 7% Nylon.
